events.name: Solving Grand Challenges
events.description:
Speakers:

Anne Marie Droste (Director, Entrepreneur First)
Mark Yong (CEO/Co-founder, Garuda Robotics Pte Ltd)
Lim Chee Meng (Chief Commercial Officer, HOPE Technik)
Li Hongyi (Data Engineer, Government Digital Services)


Technology and innovation has great potential to be a great force in helping communities solve grand challenges in faster, more collaborative and data-driven ways. Join us in a panel discussion with innovators and entrepreneurs who are leaders in their fields. They will discuss the challenges they are solving - from drones to first responder vehicles to nurturing an ecosystem for engineers and computer scientists to build world-class tech companies from scratch.
events.location: Expression Gallery, ArtScience Museum Level 4, , Singapore
